RODIMUS PRIMAL was just nodding and moving to turn around when a call
came in, "Can any one here me, mayday, mayday! We have been covered by
some sort of explosion!" A strident voice came over the com systems.

The voice over the link was OPTIMUS PRIMAL

> <NEW>
>
> There was a grunt from DINOBOT.  "No."  he paused, then again went to
> consider.  "let the Autobots and Maximals deal wtih it."  THen another
> thought.  "Set off the explosives you hvae on top of the ones that alreayd
> went off.  That will bury them extgra well and give us more time for our
> assignment."
>
> In total fairness, setting off an explosion even when one had already gone
> off was totally acceptable tactical procedure.  They had the bombs, why not
> use them?

<NEW>

There was a pause from the the communication, "Who is that giving us
commands there?" RIPPERSNAPPER said to HUN-GRR via comlink. "That
sounds like Dinobot. But I heard he was dead."

"Yeah." BLOT's voice came over. "Didn't Megatron kill him . . . twice?"

HUN-GRR looked completely baffled as he struggled to figure out
something to say. Obviously something wasn't right.

(TAG)

- Preston
